caption.center: CHARLES CARTER v. MONICA S. CARTER.

opinion.posture: In re Carter, Charles; applying for supervisory and/or remedial writ; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. CW87 1641; Parish of Pointe Coupee, 18th Judicial District Court, Div. "C".
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Granted for the sole purpose of transferring to the district court to receive the amended petition filed in this Court.West Page 126
